review: Works on the HDMI port of my Samsung TV with Netflix and Youtube although at times I do get frequent interruptions in the program reception. I believe that these interruptions are caused by Chromecast rather than my Internet Service Provider due to the fact that I seldom experience them when watching Netflix diredtly on my Dell Inspiron laptop computer.
author: George Free

review: I had to reset it because it wasn't properly detecting my wireless, but after that it started working fine. I don't really have much to say about it. After I reset it, I plugged it in, set it all up, and was able to stream from my computer/iPhone without any further hassle. There are some issues with streaming from other places beyond YouTube, or even streaming from local video files, but I know how to find addons or troubleshoot solutions to circumvent that problem, but it would be nice if there was a reliable catch-all program or addon that could cast from ChromeCast. Regardless, I'm content with my purchase.
author: Grim Meteor "SoldierMorty"

review: You get what you pay for.  Returned it, spent more money on a Roku 3, which is much better.
author: Stormville Cooker

review: Easy to setup!  & Easy to use!  No Problems at all!
author: Edward G.

review: Fantastic product, a must have for any household that streams.
author: John Luckenbach

review: Very happy with my purchase.. It is a usefull and cool gadget!
